original: Atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ, dhammasākacchā, paripucchā, sīlasamādānaṁ, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
analyzed: ▁atthi ▁gabbh aseyy āya ▁dhammadesanā ▁dhammassa van aṃ ▁dhamma sā kacch ā ▁pari pucchā ▁sīl asamā dānaṃ ▁indriy esu ▁ gutt advāra tā ▁bhojan e ▁ matt aññu tā ▁pubba ratt āpa ra ratt aṃ ▁jāgar iy ānuyog oti

original: natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
analyzed: ▁natthi ▁gabbh aseyy āya ▁dhammadesanā ▁dhammassa van aṃ ▁pe ▁pubba ratt āpa ra ratt aṃ ▁jāgar iy ānuyog oti

original: Hañci natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: ▁hañci ▁natthi ▁gabbh aseyy āya ▁dhammadesanā ▁dhammassa van aṃ ▁pe ▁pubba ratt āpa ra ratt aṃ ▁jāgar iy ānuyog o ▁no ▁ca ▁vata ▁ re ▁vattabbe

original: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāroti?
parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: ▁par ato ▁ca ▁ ghos o ▁yoniso ▁ca ▁ manasikār o ▁no ▁ca ▁vata ▁ re ▁vattabbe
▁sutt assa ▁pa matt assa ▁mu ṭṭh assa ti ssa ▁asam pa jān assa ▁dhammā bhisamay oti
